attributes.action: buy Iran's navy some reliable sat nav equipment, as a token of Britain's remorse for tresspassing into its territorial waters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is surely the best way to defuse the situation and prevent any kind of repeat.

rejection.details: This is clearly intended to be humourous.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
